ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In a typical day, about how much time do you spend using social media (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, TikTok)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Less than 1 hour a day; 2= 1 to 2 hours; 3= 3 to 4 days; 4= 5 to 6 days; 5= 7 to 8 hours; 6= More than 8 hours a day

ElementDescription: Not counting the time you spend on social media, how often do you talk on the phone, video chat (e.g., Skype, FaceTime, Zoom, WhatsApp), text, or chat online with family or friends?/ALL OTHERS: How often do you talk on the phone, video chat (e.g., Skype, FaceTime, Zoom, WhatsApp), text, or chat online with family or friends?
Notes: 1= Every day or almost every day; 2= A few times a week; 3= A few times a month; 4= Once a month; 5= Less than once a month; 6= Never

ElementDescription: On the days you do so, about how much time do you usually spend talking on the phone, video chatting, texting, or chatting online with family or friends?
Notes: 1= 1 to 15 minutes a day; 2= 16 to 30 minutes; 3= 31 to 60 minutes; 4= 1 to 2 hours; 5= More than 2 hours a day

ElementDescription: About how many family members or friends do you talk to on the phone, video chat, text, or chat with online at least once a month?
How often do you get together in person with friends or family members?
Notes: 1= Every day or almost every day; 2= A few times a week; 3= A few times a month; 4= Once a month; 5= Less than once a month; 6= Never

ElementDescription: About how many family members or friends do you get together with in person at least once a month?
How often do you attend either in-person or virtual meetings of religious, fraternal, political, social, or recreational groups?
Notes: 1= Every day or almost every day; 2= A few times a week; 3= A few times a month; 4= Once a month; 5= Less than once a month; 6= Never

ElementDescription: How religious or spiritual do you consider yourself to be?
Notes: 1= Very; 2= Somewhat; 3= A little; 4= Not at all

ElementDescription: How much do the people in your personal life make you feel loved and cared for?
Notes: 1= Extremely; 2= A lot; 3= Some; 4= A little; 5= Not at all

ElementDescription: How much could you depend on the people in your personal life for help if you needed it?
Notes: 1= Extremely; 2= A lot; 3= Some; 4= A little; 5= Not at all

ElementDescription: How much do the people in your personal life understand the way you feel about things?
Notes: 1= Extremely; 2= A lot; 3= Some; 4= A little; 5= Not at all

ElementDescription: How much do the people in your personal life show concern for your feelings and problems?
Notes: 1= Extremely; 2= A lot; 3= Some; 4= A little; 5= Not at all

ElementDescription: How often do the people in your personal life make unreasonable demands on you?
Notes: 1= Very Often; 2= Often; 3= Sometimes; 4= Rarely; 5= Never

ElementDescription: How often do the people in your personal life argue with you or say things that make you feel bad?
Notes: 1= Very Often; 2= Often; 3= Sometimes; 4= Rarely; 5= Never

ElementDescription: How many people in your personal life could you confide in without fear of negative judgement?

When you have a problem or worry, how often do you let that person know about it? /When you have a problem or worry, how often do you let either of those people in your personal life know about it?/ALL OTHERS: When you have a problem or worry, how often do you let any of those people in your personal life know about it?)
Notes: 1= Very Often; 2= Often; 3= Sometimes; 4= Rarely; 5= Never

ElementDescription: How often do you feel lonely?
Notes: 1= All or almost all of the time; 2; Most of the time; 3= Some of the time; 4= A little of the time; 5= None of the time

ElementDescription: How severe are your feelings of loneliness when you have them?
Notes: 1= Very severe; 2= Severe; 3= Moderate; 4= Mild

ElementDescription: How has your experience of loneliness changed since before the COVID-19 outbreak?
Notes: 1= More lonely now than before the outbreak; 2= No change; 3= Less lonely now than before the outbreak

ElementDescription: How well do the following statements describe you? The people in my personal life would be happier without me
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: How well do the following statements describe you? I am a burden to the people in my personal life
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: How well do the following statements describe you? I feel like I belong
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: How well do the following statements describe you? The people in my personal life need me and would be much worse off if I were not around
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: It is easy for me to become emotionally close to others. I am comfortable depending on them and having them depend on me. I do not worry about being alone or having others not accept me.
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: I am uncomfortable getting emotionally close to others. I want emotionally close relationships, but I find it difficult to trust others completely or to depend on them. I worry that I will be hurt if I allow myself to become too close to others.
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: I want to be completely emotionally intimate with others, but I often find that others are reluctant to get as close as I would like. I am uncomfortable being without close relationships, but I sometimes worry that others do not want me as much as I want them.
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: I am comfortable without close emotional relationships. It is very important to me to feel independent and self-sufficient, and I prefer not to depend on others or have others depend on me.
Notes: 1= Exactly like you; 2= A lot; 3= Somewhat; 4= A little; 5= Not at all like you

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Form used/assessment name
How many people could you rely on for support and comfort if you had a serious personal problem?
How many people in your personal life would you feel comfortable confiding in without feeling embarrassed if you had a serious personal problem?
I am carefully listened to and understood by family members or friends.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Among my friends or relatives, there is someone who makes me feel better when I am feeling down.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree; 444= Do not wish to respond; 999= No answer; 888= Skipped; 777= Condition Skipped; 555= Missing

ElementDescription: I have problems that I can't discuss with friends or relatives.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Among my friends or relatives, there is someone I go to when I need good advice.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree; 444= Do not wish to respond; 999= No answer; 888= Skipped; 777= Condition Skipped; 555= Missing

ElementDescription: My friends or relatives would lend me money if I needed it.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree; 444= Do not wish to respond; 999= No answer; 888= Skipped; 777= Condition Skipped; 555= Missing

ElementDescription: My friends or relatives would help me move my belongings if I needed to.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Somewhat disagree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree; 4= Somewhat agree; 5= Strongly agree; 444= Do not wish to respond; 999= No answer; 888= Skipped; 777= Condition Skipped; 555= Missing

ElementDescription: How much could you rely on people in your personal life for support and comfort if you had a serious personal problem?
Notes: 1=A lot; 2=Some; 3=A little; 4=Not at all
